text: František Brezničan (born 25 June 1983 in Považská Bystrica) is a Slovak football defender who currently plays for Púchov. ==Career== ===Club=== In March 2011, he joined Górnik Polkowice. He was released half year later. ==References== ==External links== * * Profile at feribreznican.webnode.sk * Profile at ksgornik.com.pl * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Slovak footballers Category:MFK Vítkovice players Category:MFK Karviná players Category:FK Fotbal Třinec players Category:MŠK Púchov players Category:FK Bodva Moldava nad Bodvou players Category:Górnik Polkowice players Category:People from Považská Bystrica Category:Slovak expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland
title: František Brezničan
